backend/main.mo: Main backend canister defining question paper types, user profiles with roles, authorization checks, and functions for creating and storing papers.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profiles into new profiles by assigning a default teacher role and preserving existing state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collected summaries of all frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with custom OKLCH color variables and theme definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting up the application container and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, authentication handling, role-based guards, and profile-setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Component displaying a login prompt when users are not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main app layout with header navigation that adapts to user role and wraps page content and footer.
frontend/src/components/EditableQuestion: Renders an editable list of questions with add, remove, reorder, and field update controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Displays a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/MergeMetadataFor: Form for entering title, subject, and grade metadata when creating a merged paper.
frontend/src/components/MergePapersSelec: Lists existing papers with checkboxes to select multiple papers and trigger a merge action.
Form for configuring paper generation parameters including metadata, counts, and difficulty distribution.
frontend/src/components/PapersEmptyState: Shows an empty state card prompting users to generate their first paper.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial user profile creation, collecting name and role with validation and warnings.
frontend/src/components/RoleAccessDenied: Displays an access denied message based on user role and allowed roles, offering navigation to the appropriate dashboard.
frontend/src/components/RoleGuard.tsx: Wraps protected content and checks user role, showing a loading spinner or RoleAccessDenied if unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/SavePaperActions: Provides a save button that validates inputs and creates a paper draft, showing success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/student/DoubtSol: Allows students to submit doubts about a question and shows an AI‑generated answer and explanation.
frontend/src/components/student/Practice: Runs an interactive question practice flow with navigation, answer tracking, scoring, and optional doubt solving.
frontend/src/components/student/ResultsS: Displays post‑practice results including score, correctness breakdown, and per‑question review.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context via Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePapers.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching, saving, generating, and merging question papers via an actor backend.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/doubtSolver/localDoubtS: Generates a correct answer and explanation for a question based on difficulty and user doubt text.
frontend/src/lib/generator/paperGenerato: Builds randomized questions using sample pools and parameters, including difficulty distribution and marks.
frontend/src/lib/merge/mergePapers.ts: Merges multiple papers by concatenating questions and suggesting combined metadata.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GeneratePaperPage.tsx: UI page for generating papers with parameters, previewing questions, and saving results.
frontend/src/pages/MergePapersPage.tsx: UI page for selecting, merging, previewing, editing, and saving combined papers.
frontend/src/pages/MyPapersPage.tsx: Lists all user-created papers with loading and empty states, showing metadata cards and links to view or merge papers.
frontend/src/pages/PaperDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single paper with metadata, supports editing questions to save a new copy, and handles loading or missing paper states.
frontend/src/pages/StudentPortalPage.tsx: Generates and displays practice questions for students using a form-driven workflow and shows a practice session once generated.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the project's UI styling.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's metadata, features, and versioned state for the Paperly application.
